column4: How do I get things to play though both my laptop speakers and external speakers at the same time?
I think what I am wanting to turn off is called "jack sense," but I can't find anything that says how to turn it off.
I don't think you can. Most laptops have hardware "jack sense".
ah, so you do have software jack sense. Then it would be a matter of the Linux driver supporting it. In other words, don't get your hopes up...
